item.title: Benchmarking tool - Jmeter
item.description: Benchmarking: Benchmarking is a paradigm used for evaluating the technology/approach proposed over the other approaches. In other words, benchmarking is basically done to analogize how well the approach is superior/inferior to other approaches in comparison. In network technologies, benchmarking is carried out on all the areas during the evaluation of performance metrics in each experiment. To make an apple-to-apple comparison, benchmarking tools are introduced to show fairness in making the comparison.
